description:
The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.

 Item 1, GSIN:N4810, VALVE,SOLENOID:
	Part No.: 216-239-1, 
	NCAGE: 04845, AUTOMATIC SWITCH COMPANY
	Or Part No.: 593339, NCAGE: 52837, PSG CALIFORNIA
	Quantity: 4, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia.
\Item 2, GSIN:N4810, VALVE,SOLENOID:
	Part No.: 216-239-1, NCAGE: 04845, AUTOMATIC SWITCH COMPANY
	Or Part No.: 593339, NCAGE: 52837, PSG CALIFORNIA
	Quantity: 2, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.
\Item 3, GSIN: N4810, PARTS KIT,BALL VALVE:
	Part No.: 770387-284-888, NCAGE: 81576, DRESSER CANADA INC
	Part No.: 770387-288-888, NCAGE: 81576, DRESSER CANADA INC
	Part No.: 770387-289-888, NCAGE: 81576, DRESSER CANADA INC
	Quantity: 8, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia.
\Item 4, GSIN: N4810, PARTS KIT,BALL VALVE:
	Part No.: 770387-284-888, NCAGE: 81576, DRESSER CANADA INC
	Part No.: 770387-288-888, NCAGE: 81576, DRESSER CANADA INC
	Part No.: 770387-289-888, NCAGE: 81576, DRESSER CANADA INC
	Quantity: 5, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.

Note: Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering.
Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars. 
Their bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.

The requirement is subject to a preference for Canadian goods and/or services.

The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
tags: autom, switch, company, automatic switch company
full_summary:
=====================================

**Procurement Notice**

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01013468

**Solicitation Number:** W8482-230940/A

**Publication Date:** November 15, 2022

**Tender Closing Date:** January 3, 2023 at 14:00 EST

**Agency:** Department of National Defence

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Matthew Lengacher
* Email: matthew.lengacher@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: 819-939-3725
* Address: 455 Boulevard de la carrière, Gatineau, QC, J8Y 6V7

**Description of the Procurement:**

The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals for the supply of electrovalves, solenoid valves, and parts kits for ball valves. The required items are detailed below:

| Item | GSIN/NIBS | NSN/NNO | Description | Quantity | Unit of Issue | Delivery Location |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | N4810/01-3324486 | 216-239-1 | Valve, Solenoid | 4 | EA | CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia |
| 2 | N4810/01-3324486 | 216-239-1 | Valve, Solenoid | 2 | EA | CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia |
| 3 | N4810/21-9109845 | 770387-284-888 | Parts Kit, Ball Valve | 8 | EA | CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia |
| 4 | N4810/21-9109845 | 770387-284-888 | Parts Kit, Ball Valve | 5 | EA | CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia |

**Bidder Requirements:**

* Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars.
* Bidders proposing equivalent or substitute products must provide brand name, model, and/or part number, and NCAGE.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Preference is given to Canadian goods and/or services.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Notice of Amendment:**

This procurement notice has been amended 4 times. The relevant amendments can be found in the attachments below.

**Attachments:**

* Amendment 1 - W8482-230940 - Eng.pdf
* Amendment 3 - W
